column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH (Kohsantepheap):- The Ministry of Interior’s Criminal Police Department
column5: a detained suspect thought to be behind several armed robberies in the capital. The suspect
column8: has no fixed abode.------Cops managed to nab the suspect after he was filmed on CCTV holding up a gas station on August 30th.------After the arrest
column9: the suspect confessed to being  involved other robberies
column10: up to 350 times. His partners in crime are still on the run.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/697710.html
